main.name: Namita Jadhav
main.description: currently employed by CitiusTech where I work as a technical lead across the range of few products for Baker Hughes, as well being our lead developer.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: Technical Lead
work.description: I have been working as a Full Stack Software Engineer with General ELectric as a client. Here, I have had the chance to dig in and get my hands dirty on every module of the product. One of the prime projects was to work on the legacy app focusing on its front end technologies in energy domain, as well as created new framework in Angular for building new applications with it. Besides, I have also led the development of V2 for a new consumer for this framework. I have worked extensively with Angular libraries for creating custom widgets and documentation for the prospective consumers.

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: Zeus learning was an great opportunity to get hands on experience on interative course developement. This project consisted of different sub-projects which focused on development of job and career related products. The main objective of this project is to provide different tests, course material, e-books, etc. to registered users through libraries or portals

projects.title: Whatsapp Clone
projects.category: A fun tool to find what goes behind a chat application like Whatsapp

testimonials.text: She is a great team member to work with. Goes in depth of the problem and recommends some good solutions. Very helpful to the team members. Doesnâ€™t shy away to put efficient ideas on to the table.

I've worked alongside Namita for close to two years now. We worked on a couple of projects together for a client and performed under tight timelines to launch the product. She brings all her skills and abilities to the table as a software developer. Namita also focuses a lot on code hygiene which makes the code a breeze to go through. Namita has grown quickly, and her willingness to learn and take on these new responsibilities is something desired in any professional.
